response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product has been priced at $12,000 based on its market value and our production costs. However, considering the importance of making this opportunity accessible to you, I am extending a special offer. I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This offer is exclusive to you and aims to ensure that you receive the best possible deal while still allowing us to cover our expenses and maintain our business operations. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11000}
